name: ai-agent-training-monorepo
description: AI Agent Training Class - Monorepo with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.test:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && python -m pytest tests/ || echo 'Trading agent tests not implemented yet'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:api && npm run setup:web && npm run setup:trading
scripts.setup:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements_simple.txt && pip install jinja2
scripts.exercise5: npm run observability:start && sleep 10 && npm run start:trading
scripts.clean: npm run clean:web && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:trading
scripts.clean:api: cd apps/api && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && rm -rf venv __pycache__ reports/*.txt && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

author: AI Training Class
